

name: Python application CI

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Check out repository code
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    - name: Set up Python environment
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: '3.x'  # Use the latest stable version of Python

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install unittest  # Install the unittest module, though it's included by default with Python

    - name: Run tests
      run: |
        python -m unittest discover  # Discover and run all tests in the repository


        IGNORE THIS PLEASE
